snippet.title: Pranksters PC game (2005)
snippet.description: The family of our little hero moves into anew town where everything seems to beperfect at the beginning. But this peace intown was too fragile. Vandalism appearedin the city by a gang of Pranksters.Pollution, fear and evil tricks bringcomplete chaos in the new home of ourhero. What more, just right after theappearance of Pranksters under unknowncircumstances the museum lost itsworthiest piece: the Treasure of theIndians. It is time to take control! Butviolence cannot be solved by anotherviolence. You rather have to be smartenough to get rid of the Pranksters,restore the peaceful life of the citizensand find the tracks of the stolen treasure.Use clever tricks at the right time at theright places and of course watch yourback not to get hurt by the Pranksters.But beware using too many tricks, not tobecome a Prankster yourself.
